title: Farmer Medium Skin Tone
description: A person working on a farm, tending to crops or animals, depicted with a medium skin tone. Represents agriculture, rural life, and hard work.
apple_vendor_description: The farmer emoji on Apple devices, depicted with a medium skin tone, embodies diligent work and connection to the land, rendered with Apple's signature realistic lighting and soft textures. They are often shown in practical attire, perhaps with a hat, projecting an air of groundedness and agricultural expertise. This emoji, seen on Apple devices, celebrates the essential role of farmers and their contribution to sustenance.
